Key Match Events: Wales held 10-man Turkey to a 0-0 draw in Craig Bellamy's first match in charge
Baris Alper Yilmaz was sent off for Turkey after catching the boot of Neco Williams
Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy was appointed as the new manager of Wales on a four-year deal in July
Bellamy set a target for Wales to go to a World Cup
Post-Match Reflections: Bellamy's side take on Montenegro on Monday as they bid for their first win under their new manager
Kevin De Bruyne scored twice for Belgium in their 3-1 win over Israel
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales had the better of the chances against Turkey but failed to capitalise on their numerical advantage
Turkey managed just one shot on target in the match
Others: Erling Haaland was in action for Norway but failed to score as his side drew 0-0 with Kazakhstan
